casebody.data:
STATE
v.
MYERS and COLEMAN. No. 660PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Thomas Henry Myers. Brian Michael Aus, Durham, for Jesse Warren Coleman. Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of May 2006 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 31st day of May 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
